Welcome to Castle Manager Info!
If you want to check Castles Siege Status
Use command:
.siege_of_gludio = Gludio Castle
.siege_of_dion = Dion Castle
.siege_of_giran = Giran Castle
.siege_of_oren = Oren Castle
.siege_of_aden = Aden Castle
.siege_of_innadril = Innadril Castle
.siege_of_goddard = Goddard Castle
.siege_of_rune = Rune Castle
.siege_of_schuttgart = Schuttgart Castle

*If you see this Menu it means that GNU grafic menu is
under config
